text: @WhiteHouse Shut up fool. Had you taken information from then about COVID-19 we would have been better proofread. The blood of 59k lies solely in your hands and not in WHO. A country as an island on to itself in a global world In a non-entity jackass. Sit down and shut up brainless!!
